content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for the location and amenities of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 550 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Still too low, I'm afraid. This apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern amenities. Are you sure you can't offer more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 575 Euro per month sounds fair for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort, but I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a price that reflects the true value of the apartment. It's a great deal for someone looking for a modern, centrally located place to live. Are you able to increase your offer further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 600 Euro per month is my highest offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euro per month is still below my expectations for this apartment. It's a fantastic opportunity for someone looking for a luxurious living experience in the heart of the city. Are you able to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can't afford to pay more than 600 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your budget constraints, but I must find a tenant who is willing to pay the fair market value for this apartment. If you're unable to increase your offer, I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your application. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best of luck in your search for a suitable dwelling. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
